channel.title: How do i make a 508 client
channel.description: I want to make a 508 client that when you hit run it just connects to my server ive seen a few of these but i dont know how to make them. can someone give me a link on where to download one or show me how to do it? my server ip is yahoo-skillz.no-ip.biz
